local_intent: Verify TCP yaw at 90°, then approach and align precisely to the T-block with 0.5 cm tolerance and confirm pose.
assumptions: If orientation check fails, SetTCPYaw corrects it.
IsAt(t_block) is a sufficient post-align verification.
coherence_with_global: Keeps detect → yaw-verify/correct → move-above → ApproachAndAlign (0.005, 1200ms) → verify, matching the global plan before push actions.
